response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 by you, making it a perfect fit for your needs. Considering this, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to support your business growth.", "product_price": 11500}
